item.description:
For those with tricks up their sleeves, this is a card game night!

This event will focus on card games.  Card games are fun if you like create patterns or sets and/or like to gamble against randomness.  Some are whimsy.  Some require long-term planning and strategy.  We will welcome both conventional and fantasy card games tonight and players of all suits. ;-)

Some examples of card games people in this group have been known to enjoy are:

  • Hearts
  • Briscola
  • Wizard
  • Dominion
  • Tichu
  • Mystery Rummy
  • Skat
  • Whist
  • Canasta
  • Fluxx

Heck, even Sequence may make an appearance. ;-)

So if you like any of these games or want to learn more about this genre, this event will be for you.  We welcome new players with open arms.

This is an unregulated group event.  There may be multiple games going on at once, so just find one to jump into or get one started when you arrive!

---

IMPORTANT NOTE: This venue may change a couple days before the event.  I wanted to post the event to gauge how many people plan on attending and if I worry that the restaurant will get too crowded, I will change the location.  So keep that in mind when you RSVP.

---

About the location:  
Londi's is a budget-friendly pizza and sandwich shop located in Danversport overlooking the water, right along Route 35 not too far from Salem.  There is a large central space with plenty of tables.  Menu can be found here.  They are open until 10pm.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Card Game Night in Danvers
